message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CY, cs.CR

The paper discusses the relationship between humans and artificially intelligent agents, specifically in terms of trust. It also surveys various techniques and approaches for building trust in these agents. Given this focus, the most likely sub-category is Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), followed by Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Robotics (cs.RO). Cybersecurity (cs.CY) and Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) are also possible sub-categories, as trust is closely related to security and privacy concerns.
